name: Wearable-backback
tagline: a place to store wearable experiments from the FablabTorino wearable workshop
body:
### Welcome to the Interactive Wearable Backpack Workshop Site 
This workshop has been held in [FablabTorino](fablabtorino.org) by Davide Gomba and Arianna Merlo, Giulia Nota and Giovanna Esposito from [BATNA](http://www.batna.it/).

![Interactive Wearable Workshop](http://fablabtorino.org/wp-content/uploads/BATNA_blog.jpg)

### The Program of the Workshop 

lesson #1 - 19:00 - 23:00	Lasercutting and Assembly	23/2/2015
lesson #2 - 19:00 - 23:00	Intro to Arduino        	27/2/2015
lesson #3 - 19:00 - 23:00	Arduino + Assembly 	        2/3/2015
lesson #4 - 19:00 - 23:00	Finalizing               	5/3/2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
